verses.verse: The hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was upon me <S%H3318><s%>, and carried me out in the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and set me down <S%H5117><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the valley <S%H1237><s%> which was full <S%H4392><s%> of bones <S%H6106><s%>,

And caused me to pass <S%H5674><s%> by them round about <S%H5439><s%>: and <S%H3966><s%>, behold, there were very many <S%H7227><s%> in the open <S%H6440><s%> valley <S%H1237><s%>; and <S%H3966><s%>, behold, they were very dry <S%H3002><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, can these bones <S%H6106><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>? And I answered <S%H559><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>, you know <S%H3045><s%>.

Again he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H5012><s%>, Prophesy upon these bones <S%H6106><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3002><s%>, O you dry bones <S%H6106><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%> unto these bones <S%H6106><s%>; Behold <S%H7307><s%>, I will cause breath to enter <S%H935><s%> into you <S%H2421><s%>, and you shall live:

And I will lay <S%H5414><s%> sinews <S%H1517><s%> upon you <S%H5927><s%>, and will bring up flesh <S%H1320><s%> upon you <S%H7159><s%>, and cover you with skin <S%H5785><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> breath <S%H7307><s%> in you <S%H2421><s%>, and you shall live; and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

So I prophesied <S%H5012><s%> as I was commanded <S%H6680><s%>: and as I prophesied <S%H5012><s%>, there was a noise <S%H6963><s%>, and behold a shaking <S%H7494><s%>, and the bones <S%H6106><s%> came together <S%H7126><s%>, bone <S%H6106><s%> to his bone <S%H6106><s%>.

And when I looked <S%H7200><s%>, behold <S%H1517><s%>, the sinews and the flesh <S%H1320><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> upon them <S%H5785><s%>, and the skin covered <S%H7159><s%> them above <S%H4605><s%>: but there was no breath in them <S%H7307><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto me <S%H5012><s%>, Prophesy unto the wind <S%H7307><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%>, son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> to the wind <S%H7307><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; Come <S%H935><s%> from the four <S%H702><s%> winds <S%H7307><s%>, O breath <S%H7307><s%>, and breathe <S%H5301><s%> upon these slain <S%H2026><s%>, that they may live <S%H2421><s%>.

So I prophesied <S%H5012><s%> as he commanded <S%H6680><s%> me <S%H7307><s%>, and the breath came <S%H935><s%> into them <S%H2421><s%>, and they lived, and stood up <S%H5975><s%> upon their feet <S%H7272><s%>, a exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> army <S%H2428><s%>.

Then he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, these bones <S%H6106><s%> are the whole house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: behold <S%H559><s%>, they say, Our bones <S%H6106><s%> are dried <S%H3001><s%>, and our hope <S%H8615><s%> is lost <S%H6><s%>: we are cut off for our parts <S%H1504><s%>.

Therefore prophesy <S%H5012><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; Behold <S%H5971><s%>, O my people, I will open <S%H6605><s%> your graves <S%H6913><s%>, and cause you to come up <S%H5927><s%> out of your graves <S%H6913><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, when I have opened <S%H6605><s%> your graves <S%H6913><s%>, O my people <S%H5971><s%>, and brought you up <S%H5927><s%> out of your graves <S%H6913><s%>,

And shall put <S%H5414><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%> in you <S%H2421><s%>, and you shall live, and I shall place <S%H3240><s%> you in your own land <S%H127><s%>: then shall you know <S%H3045><s%> that I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it <S%H6213><s%>, and performed it <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
The word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came again unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Moreover <S%H1121><s%>, you son of man <S%H120><s%>, take <S%H3947><s%> you one <S%H259><s%> stick <S%H6086><s%>, and write <S%H3789><s%> upon it <S%H3063><s%>, For Judah, and for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> his companions <S%H2270><s%>: then take <S%H3947><s%> another <S%H259><s%> stick <S%H6086><s%>, and write <S%H3789><s%> upon it <S%H3130><s%>, For Joseph, the stick <S%H6086><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, and for all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> his companions <S%H2270><s%>:
And join <S%H7126><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> to another <S%H259><s%> into one <S%H259><s%> stick <S%H6086><s%>; and they shall become one <S%H259><s%> in your hand <S%H3027><s%>.
And when the sons <S%H1121><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> shall speak <S%H559><s%> unto you <S%H559><s%>, saying, Will you not show us what you mean by these <S%H5046><s%>?

Say <S%H1696><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; Behold <S%H3947><s%>, I will take the stick <S%H6086><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, which is in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, and the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> his fellows <S%H2270><s%>, and will put <S%H5414><s%> them with him <S%H6086><s%>, even with the stick of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> stick <S%H6086><s%>, and they shall be one <S%H259><s%> in my hand <S%H3027><s%>.
And the sticks <S%H6086><s%> whereon you write <S%H3789><s%> shall be in your hand <S%H3027><s%> before their eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

And say <S%H1696><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; Behold <S%H3947><s%>, I will take the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from among <S%H996><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, where they be gone <S%H1980><s%>, and will gather <S%H6908><s%> them on every side <S%H5439><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> them into their own land <S%H127><s%>:

And I will make <S%H6213><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and one <S%H259><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> shall be king <S%H4428><s%> to them all <S%H5750><s%>: and they shall be no more two <S%H8147><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>, neither shall they be divided <S%H2673><s%> into two <S%H8147><s%> kingdoms any more at all <S%H4467><s%>:

Neither shall they defile <S%H2930><s%> themselves any more with their idols <S%H1544><s%>, nor with their detestable things <S%H8251><s%>, nor with any of their transgressions <S%H6588><s%>: but I will save <S%H3467><s%> them out of all their dwellingplaces <S%H4186><s%>, where they have sinned <S%H2398><s%>, and will cleanse <S%H2891><s%> them <S%H5971><s%>: so shall they be my people, and I will be their God <S%H430><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> shall be king <S%H4428><s%> over them <S%H259><s%>; and they all shall have one shepherd <S%H7462><s%>: they shall also walk <S%H3212><s%> in my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and observe <S%H8104><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and do them <S%H6213><s%>.

And they shall live <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> that I have given <S%H5414><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>, where your fathers <S%H1><s%> have lived <S%H3427><s%>; and they shall live <S%H3427><s%> in it <S%H1121><s%>, even they, and their sons, and their children <S%H1121><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: and my servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> shall be their prince <S%H5387><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.

Moreover I will make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> with them <S%H5769><s%>; it shall be a everlasting covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them <S%H5414><s%>: and I will place them <S%H7235><s%>, and multiply them <S%H5414><s%>, and will set my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them for evermore <S%H5769><s%>.
My tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> also shall be with them <S%H430><s%>: Yes, I will be their God, and they shall be my people <S%H5971><s%>.

And the heathen <S%H1471><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> do sanctify <S%H6942><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, when my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them for evermore <S%H5769><s%>.
